tool_description: An API showing data about English translations from Weekly Shonen Jump
name: Unofficial Shonen Jump
title: Unofficial Shonen Jump

api_list.name: Get Upcoming Chapter Schedule
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all upcoming manga available in the English release of Weekly Shonen Jump
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-shonen-jump.p.rapidapi.com/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-shonen-jump.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Manga
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return all manga available in English from Weekly Shonen Jump.

Returns title, manga_link, newest_chapter_link, latest_chapter_date, and latest_chapter_number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-shonen-jump.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-shonen-jump.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
